snippet: Detroit has been given approval to move forward with a $120 million quality-of-life loan to help improve city services.
abstract: Detroit is given approval by Federal Judge Seven Rhodes to move forward with a $120 million quality-of-life loan to help improve city services.
lead_paragraph: Detroit has been given approval to move forward with a $120 million quality-of-life loan to help improve city services.

headline.main: Michigan: Detroit Allowed to Borrow for City Services
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Detroit Allowed to Borrow for City Services
